message.content: Yes, the authors mention that participants provided informed consent electronically for the psychophysics experiments conducted on Amazon Mechanical Turk (mturk.com). They were also compensated for their time, as stated in the "Psychophysics participants and dataset" section.
Yes, the authors mention that participants in the psychophysics experiments provided informed consent electronically. Consent was obtained from the participants recruited from Amazon Mechanical Turk.

Yes, the authors mention that participants provided informed consent electronically for the psychophysics experiments conducted and involving Amazon Mechanical Turk workers. This is an indication that they took ethical aspects into account while obtaining and using participants' data for their research.
